definition: San Juan, capital of Puerto Rico
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: One example is the Mission San Juan Capistrano.
sentences.chinese: 一个例子是团圣胡安卡皮斯特拉。

sentences.english: The beautiful San Juan Islands in Washington State are tailor made for romance.
sentences.chinese: 圣胡安群岛位于华盛顿，是一个美丽而浪漫的岛屿。

sentences.english: This part of the San Juan is a popular river rafting destination.
sentences.chinese: 圣胡安河的这一河段是著名的漂流目的地。

sentences.english: Next time you want to go from San Juan to New York, you take the train.
sentences.chinese: 下次从圣胡安回纽约，你就坐火车。
